TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Buner, title = Buner, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buner} }

S.FORM: alang Buner ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Ci'an go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 1,710 buwan, 4,775 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 24% kyan ku 1,133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 76% kyan ku 3,642 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 21%, Truku 1%, Bunun 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Buner hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Buner hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Buner hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Buner hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Buner hya' ga Fulufuluan. tay mkyahu' na Buner hya' ga Natawran. tay 'zil na Buner hya' ga Ciripunan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Boner ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Ci'an go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 1,710 bowan, 4,775 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 24% kyan ko 1,133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 76% kyan ko 3,642 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 21%, Troko 1%, Bonon 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Boner hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Boner hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Boner hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Boner hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Boner hya' ga Folofoloan. tay mkyaho' na Boner hya' ga Natawran. tay 'zil na Boner hya' ga Ciriponan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
